body:
On Wed, Sep 2, 2015 at 9:27 PM kostya-sh <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I'd like to question how important SemVer is in this proposal.
>
> In an ideal world everyone would use SemVer and use it correctly. However
> in the real world some projects do not use it at all:
>
>    - https://github.com/coreos/go-systemd repo has tags v1, v2, v3
>
>
I just made something up because people wanted a tag anchor and I had no
intention of trying to maintain API compatibility. So, I am happy to tag
v4.0.0 to bring it inline with this proposal

Brandon

>
